messages.title: Fighting for our local services
messages.content: Nothing is more important to Andrew Duffield than our NHS, which he has fought for throughout his political career. He has fought for local services like Hexham General Hospital and the Leisure Centre, opposed plans to cut taxes and raise pay for low paid staff.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting to save our NHS and protect local jobs by opposing plans to cut taxes and raise pay for low paid staff.
A governor at one of our excellent Middle Schools, Andrew is committed to our local education.
Andrew has been involved in campaigns for local issues like Hexham General Hospital and the Leisure Centre.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Lib Dem 1st - the only way to beat the Tory outsider.

issues.education: A governor at one of our excellent Middle Schools.
issues.health: Fighting for local services like Hexham General Hospital.

leaflet.personalStatement: Andrew Duffield has lived in Northumberland most of his life. He has been a campaigner on local issues.

quotes.text: See what Andrew Duffield is doing for our area insideâ€”

images.caption: Andrew Duffield meeting hard working staff at Hexham General Hospital.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet puts emphasis on Andrew Duffield being a local candidate as opposed to the 'Tory outsider', highlighting a tactical voting message implying that voting for Liberal Democrats is the only way to beat the Conservative candidate.
